Frequently Asked Questions

Most Popular Questions

Can I play from my country? We offer our services to many countries worldwide, all of which are listed on our registration page. If you are successfully registered with us, you can be sure that you can play with us.
How often do people win? At {关键词}, we have winners every day! The lottery is a game of chance, meaning that luck can strike anyone at any moment.
How will you pay me my winnings? Winnings are automatically added to your {关键词} balance and can be withdrawn from the “My account” menu. Smaller winnings take about 2 weeks to reach your bank account or web wallet, whereas jackpot-sized withdrawals take longer.

Jackpot winnings can be transferred as a lump-sum or in increments to a bank account in your name. You can also choose to have your winnings paid out in several web wallets, depending on your country and other factors.
How long have you been operating for? {关键词} was officially established in 2025 and collectively, the team behind the brand has decades worth of industry experience. They’ve worked with the most reputable partners in the industry and now bring that expertise to {关键词}.
How do I know this site is real? Read more here!

New Customers

How do I register? Registration with us is quick and easy! Go to {关键词}.com, click REGISTER and fill in the “Join {关键词}” form. Check your inbox for your Welcome Email.

(If you do not receive the Welcome Email, it might be in your Spam or Junk folder.)
How do I claim my sign up bonus? Make your first successful deposit on {关键词} and you’ll get a 50% DEPOSIT BONUS that you can use to enter any lottery on our website. All the information you need about our welcome offer is available via this link.
How much did I win? All lotteries you can play with us have different prize structures, which means you have to match a different amount of numbers per lottery to qualify for a win – sometimes 2, sometimes 3.

You can view all the prize tables under Lottery Results, selecting “View Prize Breakdown” by the relevant lottery.

Deposits and Payments

How do I pay? Log in and click on the Deposit option, choose one of the payment methods available, fill out the required information and complete the deposit.
Why did my payment fail? We are very sorry that your Deposit did not work! This can be caused by factors such as:
  • Insufficient funds
  • Bank limits
  • Incorrect card details
  • Bank restrictions on gambling/foreign transactions
  • Using a VPN or proxy
Try again with the above in mind, or use alternative options on the Deposit page.
What do I do when I get the insufficient funds screen? The message means you don’t have enough funds in your bank or wallet. Try a smaller deposit or use a funded account.
Why does the Deposit screen only show a cookie? This means that you have disabled 3rd party cookies in your browser, usually in Incognito mode. Enable 3rd party cookies to continue.
How to purchase in Indian currency? Your bank or card issuer will convert the amount from EUR to your local currency and charge your card accordingly. Rates may vary and additional charges may apply.
Why do I have to deposit in Euros? Since {关键词} is based in Europe, we use Euros. When purchasing, your bank or wallet converts the Euro amount into your local currency.

Winnings and Withdrawals

How much did I win? You can view all the prize tables under Lottery Results, selecting “View Prize Breakdown” by the relevant lottery.
How can I withdraw my winnings? Login, go to “My Account” → “Withdrawal” and choose a payment option. Jackpot winnings can take up to 30 days due to vetting processes.
What will I be taxed? Different lotteries originate in different countries. Some are taxable while others are tax-free. Contact us for specific details.
Are winnings and payouts guaranteed? Yes. Small and medium withdrawals usually reach winners within 2 weeks; jackpots may take longer.

My Account

When do I get my results? As soon as the lottery organiser publishes results, an email notification is sent automatically.
How can I reset my password? Reset via the Forgot Password page, or contact us.
Can I delete my {关键词} account? You can request account closure any time by contacting support. Essential data is stored for compliance reasons.

Guides

How do I play? Log in, select a lottery, pick your numbers and complete your purchase. See our guide on “How To Play Lottery Online”.
Where do I redeem my vouchers? Log in, go to “My Offers” and use the voucher when purchasing your lottery entry.
Where do I find the option to withdraw? In the “My Account” menu, top right on desktop, or main menu on mobile.
Where is my lottery entry? Every entry is listed in Transaction History and My Results. A confirmation email is also sent.
Where is the cart? We simplified the process and removed the cart. You must deposit first before selecting numbers.
Where do I enter my promo code? Log in → Promotions → enter the Promo Code. It will apply to your next purchase.
Where do I find my Transaction History? In “My Account” → “Transaction History”.
Where do I find my results? In “My Account” → “My Results”.
Where do I find my profile? In “My Account” → “Profile”.
Where do I find the log out option? In “My Account” menu on desktop or in the main menu on mobile.

Technical Issues

Why is my account suspended? Possible mismatch in registered info or recent activity. Please email [email protected] to resolve.
Why am I not getting my emails? Check spam/junk folders and mark our communication as safe. Also ensure your notification settings are enabled.
Why is my deposit bonus or cashback not reflecting? Each promotion has individual terms and may credit later. Conditions are always in the email you receive.

General Questions

What’s new on this site? A better mobile site, more user-friendly results display, and quicker payments.
Is {关键词} a scam? No. {关键词}.com launched in 2025, is licensed, and has over 500,000 customers.
How much have you paid out in winnings? Over US $3,000,000 in winnings within our first five years.
Where are your offices? We are a UK-based company with a contact centre in London.
Why are the results still pending? Some lotteries take up to 48 hours (e.g., German Lotto 6aus49) to finalise results.
When will you send me a scan of my ticket? Scanned tickets are not required. All entry information is emailed and uploaded to your account.
Do I need to travel to USA to claim my prize? No. Claiming winnings is as easy as entering your payment details in “My Account” → “Withdrawal”.
Do I need to live in the USA to play the US Powerball lottery? No. You are equally likely to win playing online with us as in the USA.
What is the annuity payment option? Annuity payments are spread over 30 years. Most winners opt for the lump-sum payout.
Is {关键词} legal in India? Addressed in “Can I play from my country?”.
